column1: They want to do everything on the list, whereas women are interested in the actual making of the list.
I was saying you made a collection of about 200 shopping lists that you found discarded.
So wait shows lists would look much like an algae list, unless they’d put something specific to that shop in it.
“Oh my word, you might have one of mine.“
Because it’s only got your shopping on it.
But they are very intimate, as Joe says.
Well, yes and no, but because that person was concerned
